structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Labour Force Status Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of labour force status categories including employment, unemployment, inactivity, and other population groups for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are currently employed, including employees, self-employed, and family workers.

structure:Code.common:Name: Unemployed
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are without work, available for work, and actively seeking employment.

structure:Code.common:Name: Labour Force
structure:Code.common:Description: Total of employed and unemployed persons, representing the economically active population.

structure:Code.common:Name: Inactive
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons who are neither employed nor unemployed, including students, retirees, and others not seeking work.

structure:Code.common:Name: Reasons for not seeking employment (inactive)
structure:Code.common:Description: Inactive persons with specific reasons for not seeking employment, such as education, family responsibilities, or health issues.

structure:Code.common:Name: Total Population
structure:Code.common:Description: Total population aged 15 and over, including all labour force status categories.

structure:Code.common:Name: Population living in jobless households
structure:Code.common:Description: Persons living in households where no member is employed, including children and other dependents.
